lyrics:
5 contributorsswingin’ lyricsverse 1
hangin in the vip
i waw him comin to holla at me
a playboy pique my curiosity
when he asked me if i wanted to trade
i was on my second drink and feelin sexy
now what is he thinkin
bangin dancin
which way is he swingin
what did he want from me

prechorus
oh i aint got no hangups
oh i come to have fun tonight
oh i might wanna check him out
oh i as long as he can swing it my way
oh i like his confidence
oh i so busy talklin shit
oh i hope he can handle this
lets take it to the floor
lets spend the whole night swingin

chorus
be bop be bop be bop be ba
if you like swingin get your hands up
be bop be bop be bop be ba
if you like swingin get your hands up get your hands up
be bop be bop be bop be ba
if you like swingin get your hands up swingin
be bop be bop be bop be ba
if you like swingin get your hands up
you might also likeverse 2
swingin fingers poppin still beboppin
we get tired but aint no stoppin
come on with it sweat keeps droppin
rollin off the side of my face
dirty dancin huggin kissin
all the fun i woulda been missin
didnt know he had it like this
and its so good i want some more

prechorus
oh i aint got no hangups
oh i come to have fun tonight
oh i might wanna check him out
oh i as long as he can swing it my way
oh i like his confidence
oh i so busy talkin shit
oh i hope he can handle this

be bop be bop be bop be ba

bridge
dont need a tired cliché
if you wanna make a move my way
so keep them lies restrained
its about what you do not what you say
got daddys obsessed
tryin to get under my dress my dress
but im not impressed
baby boy is dreamin less
hes plannin on swingin

oh i be do do do
oh i da da da dsa do
ohohoh im feeling the groove yeah
da da da da da
